us.zoom.sdk

Interface InMeetingService


  • public interface InMeetingService
    Zoom in-meeting service. Note: All the interfaces must be called in meeting process

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long activeShareUserID()
      This method is used to get active share user id in the meeting.
      long activeVideoUserID()
      This method is used to get active video user id in the meeting.
      void addListener(InMeetingServiceListener listener)
      Register a listener for in-meeting event
      boolean changeName(java.lang.String inputName, long userId)
      This method is used to change user's display name in meeting.
      InMeetingUserList getInMeetingUserList()
      Note: Don't call this interface frequently.
      long getMyUserID()
      This method is used to get my user id in the meeting.
      InMeetingUserInfo getMyUserInfo()
      This method is used to get my user info in the meeting.
      InMeetingUserInfo getUserInfoById(long userId)
      This method is used to get user info by certain userId
      boolean isHostUser(long userId)
      This method is used to check the user is host or not.
      boolean isMeetingLocked()
      This method is used to tell whether the meeting is locked by host or not.
      boolean isMuteOnEntryOn()
      This method is used to check whether MuteOnEntry is on in the meeting.
      boolean isMyself(long userId)
      This method is used to check the user is myself or not.
      boolean isPlayChimeOn()
      This method is used to check PlayChime or not while user join/leave meeting.
      boolean isSameUser(long user1, long user2)
      This method is used to judge the same user.
      boolean isShareLocked()
      This method is used to tell whether the screen share is locked by host or not.
      boolean isUserVideoSpotLighted(long userId)
      This method is used to check the user's video spotlighted or not.
      boolean lowerHand(long userId)
      This method is used to lower user's hand.
      boolean makeHost(long userId)
      This method is used to assign host role to another user in the meeting.
      boolean raiseMyHand()
      This method is used to raise my hand.
      void removeListener(InMeetingServiceListener listener)
      Unregister a listener
      boolean removeUser(long userId)
      This method is used to remove a user in the meeting.
      boolean setMuteOnEntry(boolean on)
      This method is used to set whether MuteOnEntry is on in the meeting.
      boolean setPlayChimeOnOff(boolean on)
      This method is used to set PlayChime or not while user join/leave meeting.
      boolean spotLightVideo(boolean on, long userId)
      This method is used to spotlight the user's video or not.

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        void addListener(InMeetingServiceListener listener)
        Register a listener for in-meeting event
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener instance

      • removeListener

        void removeListener(InMeetingServiceListener listener)
        Unregister a listener
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener instance

      • isMeetingLocked

        boolean isMeetingLocked()
        This method is used to tell whether the meeting is locked by host or not.
        Returns:
        true, the meeting has been locked by host.

      • changeName

        boolean changeName(java.lang.String inputName,
                   long userId)
        This method is used to change user's display name in meeting.
        Parameters:
        inputName, - the display name which will be used in meeting.
        userId, - user's ID in meeting.

      • isShareLocked

        boolean isShareLocked()
        This method is used to tell whether the screen share is locked by host or not.
        Returns:
        YES, the screen share has been locked by host.

      • getInMeetingUserList

        InMeetingUserList getInMeetingUserList()
        Note: Don't call this interface frequently. This method will return all the users in the meeting.
        Returns:
        InMeetingUserList object.

      • getMyUserID

        long getMyUserID()
        This method is used to get my user id in the meeting.
        Returns:
        my user id.

      • getMyUserInfo

        InMeetingUserInfo getMyUserInfo()
        This method is used to get my user info in the meeting.
        Returns:
        my user info, a InMeetingUserInfo object.

      • getUserInfoById

        InMeetingUserInfo getUserInfoById(long userId)
        This method is used to get user info by certain userId
        Returns:
        user info, a InMeetingUserInfo object.

      • isUserVideoSpotLighted

        boolean isUserVideoSpotLighted(long userId)
        This method is used to check the user's video spotlighted or not.
        Parameters:
        userId, - the user id in meeting.

      • spotLightVideo

        boolean spotLightVideo(boolean on,
                       long userId)
        This method is used to spotlight the user's video or not.
        Parameters:
        on, - if true to spotlight user's video; if NO to cancel spotlight user's video.
        userId, - the user id in meeting.

      • makeHost

        boolean makeHost(long userId)
        This method is used to assign host role to another user in the meeting.
        Parameters:
        userId, - the user id in meeting. *Note*: the user should not be myself, and can assign the host role .

      • removeUser

        boolean removeUser(long userId)
        This method is used to remove a user in the meeting.
        Parameters:
        userId, - the user id in meeting.

      • setMuteOnEntry

        boolean setMuteOnEntry(boolean on)
        This method is used to set whether MuteOnEntry is on in the meeting.
        Parameters:
        true - means that MuteOnEntry is on.

      • isMuteOnEntryOn

        boolean isMuteOnEntryOn()
        This method is used to check whether MuteOnEntry is on in the meeting.
        Returns:
        true means that MuteOnEntry is on.

      • setPlayChimeOnOff

        boolean setPlayChimeOnOff(boolean on)
        This method is used to set PlayChime or not while user join/leave meeting.
        Parameters:
        true - means that PlayChime is on.

      • isPlayChimeOn

        boolean isPlayChimeOn()
        This method is used to check PlayChime or not while user join/leave meeting.
        Returns:
        true means that PlayChime is on.

      • activeVideoUserID

        long activeVideoUserID()
        This method is used to get active video user id in the meeting.
        Returns:
        active video user id.

      • activeShareUserID

        long activeShareUserID()
        This method is used to get active share user id in the meeting.
        Returns:
        active share user id.

      • isSameUser

        boolean isSameUser(long user1,
                   long user2)
        This method is used to judge the same user.
        Parameters:
        user1, - user2, the user id in meeting.

      • isHostUser

        boolean isHostUser(long userId)
        This method is used to check the user is host or not.
        Returns:
        true means host.

      • isMyself

        boolean isMyself(long userId)
        This method is used to check the user is myself or not.
        Returns:
        true means myself.

      • raiseMyHand

        boolean raiseMyHand()
        This method is used to raise my hand.
        Returns:
        true means api call success.

      • lowerHand

        boolean lowerHand(long userId)
        This method is used to lower user's hand.
        Returns:
        true to lower hand.
